Add the following screenshots here:

1. dashboard.png - A screenshot of the main dashboard showing the resource simulation controls
2. signals.png - A screenshot showing the logs, metrics, and traces panels

To capture these screenshots:
1. Start both the frontend and backend servers
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5173
3. Take a screenshot of the main dashboard with some resource simulations running
4. Take another screenshot showing the observability signals (logs, metrics, traces) with some sample data
